E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 7/31/1973
Subject: Status of Wilson Fason
Dear Sir,
Wilson Fason shouldn't play at AA San Antonio Brewers!
He has an AVG of .246 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Diagnosis: Sinus Infection Nose.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 4 days.

Regards,
